"Capote" also tells a true story about Truman Capote, an author famous for his novel "In Cold Blood". Despite his fame, he forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row. The movie features talented actors including Barret Oliver, Alan Oppenheimer, Gerald McRaney, and more.
Overall, both movies "The Dot" and "Capote" are both inspired by true stories, which is similar to what the user is looking for.
